abilities: {{Ability List|{{Healing|Blood Effect Mass Healing|500-1000, heals wild creatures as well}}}}
name: Minotaur Totem
behaviour: They do not move and stand still casting its mass healing spell constantly.
location: Second floor [[Glooth Underground Factory]], east side during a [[Oramond Factory Raids|minotaurs raid]].
strategy: They are weak to [[Death Damage]] and will die quickly if two or more players focus on it. Killing it solo is also possible as long as you can deal more damage than it heals. Kill them before the other creatures otherwise you won't be able to kill anything.
